SELECT
		B.PedVndId [PEDIDO VENDA],
		A.CliId [COD CLIENTE],
		C.CliNomeRazaoSocial [RAZÃO SOCIAL],
		A.NFNum [Nº NF],
		B.ItemNFValorUnitario [VALOR UNIT],
		B.ItemNFQtd [QTD],
		B.ItemNFValorTotal [TOTAL]

FROM
			TbNotaFiscal A
LEFT JOIN	TbItemNotaFiscal B
			ON B.NFId = A.NFId
LEFT JOIN	TbCliente C
			ON C.CliId = A.CliId

WHERE
		A.NFStatus = 'I'
AND		B.PedVndId IN (
411567	,
411568	,
411924	,
411569	,
411570	,
411571	,
411572	,
411573	,
411574	,
411575	,

411576	,

411578	,
